Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Object created at the start of the game to establish the players inventory, location, health, and beamer equipment
    Version:
    2021.03.19
    Author:
    Christopher Urban

      method to return the modified health of the player.

      method to download the current rooms information to the beamer

      method to check if the selected item can be added to the inventory of the player.
      void cookieBoost()
      method to raise the amount of weight the player can carry by 10 pounds

      method to drop a specified item in the current room then the item's weight is removed from the total capacity the player is currently holding.

        Constructor for the player

    • Method Detail

      • collect

        public void collect​(Item item)
        method to check if the selected item can be added to the inventory of the player. If it can then the item is added and the total capacity the player is currently holding increases.
        Parameters:
        item - is the item being added to the inventory

      • despose

        public void despose​(Item item)
        method to drop a specified item in the current room then the item's weight is removed from the total capacity the player is currently holding.
        Parameters:
        item - is the item being removed from the inventory

      • setRoom

        public void setRoom​(Room room)
        method to set the current location of the player to the room they are in
        Parameters:
        room - the room that currentRoom will identify as

      • getItem

        public Item getItem​(java.lang.String itemVariable)
        take an item from a room.
        Parameters:
        itemVariable - the item being placed.

      • getItemString

        public java.lang.String getItemString()
        Return a string listing the items in the players inventory, for example "Items: apple pencil".
        Returns:
        Details of the room's exits.

      • cookieBoost

        public void cookieBoost()
        method to raise the amount of weight the player can carry by 10 pounds

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()
        method to return the health of the player.

      • changeHealth

        public int changeHealth​(int modifier)
        method to return the modified health of the player.

      • charge

        public void charge​(Room room)
        method to download the current rooms information to the beamer
        Parameters:
        room - the room that beamer will identify as

      • fire

        public void fire()
        method to transport the player to the room downloaded by the beamer
        Parameters:
        room - the room that beamer will transport the player

      • getCurrentRoom

        public Room getCurrentRoom()
        method to return the location of the player.
